name: Funny Bubble Garden 2
description:
Funny Bubble Garden 2 is amazing bubble shoot game features highly addictive gameplay, 3 bubble worlds and 300 FREE levels of bubble-shooting fun, global high scores, 3 star ranking system and TONS of exciting new bubbles and power ups never seen before!

How To Play:
You will get a limited ammount of fruit bubbles per level and you must shoot bubbles of same color and blast them away, you will find that some of the bubbles have hearts locked inside and it's your mission to rescure the hearts by popping all fruits.
